title: What’s the Future of Distributed Ledgers?
author: Heather Joslyn
description: Building DLTs by best open source practices will ensure their safety, said Dr. Leemon Baird and Andrew Aitken in this episode of The New Stack Makers.
cntitle: 分布式账本的未来是什么？
cndescription: 通过最佳开源实践构建 DLT 将确保其安全性，Leemon Baird 博士和 Andrew Aitken 在本期 The New Stack Makers 中表示。
